survey_brief: This survey aims to gather employee and stakeholder perceptions of the company's CSR initiatives, identifying strengths and areas for improvement.

questions.question_text: How familiar are you with our company's Corporate Social Responsibility (CSR) initiatives?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice scale to gauge baseline awareness. Consider adding a brief CSR overview if most select 'Not very' or 'Not at all'.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: radio button (SINGLE_CHOICE). Randomize option order to avoid bias.

script.question_text: How familiar are you with our company's Corporate Social Responsibility (CSR) initiatives?

questions.client_notes: Multi-select question to prioritize efforts. Display options in randomized order.

questions.question_text: How effectively do you think our company communicates its CSR efforts?

questions.question_text: What specific CSR initiative would you like to see our company undertake?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended to capture unmet expectations. Limit response to 250 characters.
